text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump President Trump spoke on July 4, to celebrate the 244th anniversary of a day he described as "the most important day in the history of nations" as an epidemic soared close to 3,000,000 confirmed COVID-19 cases and 130,000 deaths with the number of undetected cases near 25,000,000
